task_definition_name: Mifos Mobile CN: Improve the UI of homescreen
description:
## Objective 
Improve the UI of homescreen

## Description
There is a scope of UI improvement in the homescreen of the app
Icons can be made smaller

## References 
See FAQs of mifos mobile app for reference
How to get help, be sure to post your questoin to our [developer mailing list](http://mifos.org/resources/
community/communications/#mailing-lists) or  ask in our [chatroom](https://gitter.im/openMF/mifos).
